<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drakeheart Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=688)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 253 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your skin grows tough scales like a [drake](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=36), your eyesight become sharp and your pupils slitted, and your limbs grow wiry and quick, but your mind and reflexes become slow. 

**Benefit** You gain the listed bonus to AC, a Dexterity cap of +2 (as usual, use your lowest Dexterity cap if you have more than one), and an item bonus to Perception checks. If you're wearing armor, you still calculate your proficiency bonus to AC based on your proficiency in the armor you're wearing, even if the drakeheart mutagen has a higher item bonus. You also gain the Final Surge action.

<document level="2" id="action-569" />

 **Drawback** You take a –1 penalty to Will saves, Reflex saves, and all skill checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Drakeheart Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 253 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus to AC is +4, the item bonus to Perception is +1, and the duration is 1 minute or until you use Final Surge, whichever comes first.
